meanings.definition: To weep more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always tries to outweeping her sister whenever they watch sad movies together.
meanings.sent2: He was outweeping all his friends at the funeral.
meanings.sent3: The competition for outweeping the most at the play was fierce.
meanings.sent4: Her tears were like a river, outweeping all others in the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her outweeping echoed through the empty house.

meanings.definition: The act of weeping more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: His outweeping always drew attention during emotional moments.
meanings.sent2: The outweeping of the child could be heard from across the room.
meanings.sent3: The outweeping contest at the party was both funny and touching.
meanings.sent4: Her outweeping was like a waterfall, unstoppable and powerful.
meanings.sent5: The outweeping of the character in the movie left everyone in tears.
